Title: Arithmetical algorithms for elementary patterns
Abstract: © 2014, Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg.Elementary patterns of resemblance notate ordinals up to the ordinal of (formula presented)-CA<inf>0</inf>. We provide ordinal multiplication and exponentiation algorithms using these notations.
